Sheet1.Title: Asia's first metaverse wedding portrait
Sheet1.Description:
This NFT featuring the first meta-verse wedding of Asia is one of the most exclusive NFT brought to you by Namastey-NFT.
This NFT is about the attire that the bride and the groom chose for themselves. The groom is attired in something that resembles a crossover between Batman and Harry Potter, while the bride sports a very Bellatrix Lestrange-ish hairstyle, keeping a semi-Gothic black attire. This is a very special NFT as it showcases what the bride and the groom originally wanted to be in the metaverse wedding reception.

Sheet1.Title: Abuse
Sheet1.Description: I panick each time the door creaks open and reveals your terrifying presence. The trauma it brings, the pain it ignites, the scar it leaves on my already battered soul, the darkness that beclouds the tiny space you left for me, has made me the shadow of myself. Oh! How can i be free from this anguish of your constant abuse? Happiness, laughter, love and care, fled my life the day u took control over me. My worth is like spilt milk on rocks and all my six senses are bruised beyond repair. What is my crime? trust, love, loyalty and patience? I doubt i am still sane. The stigma of your abuse sticks fast.

Sheet1.Title: Windows of Joy
Sheet1.Description: Windows of joy is a piece inspired by the togetherness we explored despite the distance during the pandemic. My school was closed and I was missing my friends but then when my neighbours came to the window and spoke, sang and celebrated the world felt a lot better! The art is a shout out to everyone who was with us during these unprecedented times.

Sheet1.Title: Daemon
Sheet1.Description:
Daemon is a semi-divine spirit, usually created when a noble person or a hero dies. These beings act as a go-between for gods and mortals, delivering divine messages and blessings to mortals or reporting bad behavior to the gods.
When Cronus, the leader of the Titans, still ruled over the world, he created a “Golden Race” of men. These men were mortal, they lived much like gods, with wonderful strength and pure hearts. When one of the Golden men passed away, he became a Daemon and continued to wander the earth and watch over its future generations.

Sheet1.Title: Woven lives
Sheet1.Description: Don’t look up or around! That is what they want you to do while the planet suffocates little by little for futile profits. ‘Woven lives’ talks about the connection of humans and other species who have an equal right over earth. We are alive only if we cohabit the space and respect this relationship. Yes, climate change is real and No, it is not overrated. All elements here are woven together starting from icebergs to coral reefs, deserts to modern settlements. It is the duty of all to learn everyday practices to contribute less pollution into the bed of the earth. And duty of governments to take effective measures which will put kid activists back to schools because they can finally dream of a future. Do we still have a chance to reverse climate change? Maybe. Yes. Woven lives is just one of the ways in that direction. We have miles to go.

Sheet1.Title: Galaxy Hunters
Sheet1.Description: Galaxy Hunters are anthropomorphic bounty hunters from the planet Kunta, they are a part of an ongoing series of characters for the comic book Rapture Star

Sheet1.Title: Queen Sagittarius
Sheet1.Description:
The queen of constellations, the creator of mystical beings, the goddess of fertility, luck. This artwork depicts the human form of Queen Sagittarius who used to stay among the people during the birth of a child. Sagittarius is a calm and beautiful person and she is the wife of King Taurus where they happened to live as Peasants. 

The art has a monochrome palette for her skin and some colors which highlight her beauty.

Sheet1.Title: Fractal Petal
Sheet1.Description: Fractal Art is endless possibilities of geometry and mathematics represented as visual designs. Fractal patterns are everywhere, principle element of nature. Fractal Petal is a representation of a tiny fraction of that endless possibilities, the pattern, the colors, the design is expression of unseen world of fractal art.

Sheet1.Title: Lucid Dreams
Sheet1.Description:
Our mind is at a constant pace throughout the day, the only time it’s at rest is when we are asleep. Dreams have always been a mysterious part of our lives. These brain-driven hallucinations can feel real no matter how fantastical or surreal and can generate a range of emotions from euphoria to sadness to fear.

Lucid dreams happen when you are able to separate dreams from reality, giving you the ultimate power to have a control over your brain. This artwork is a reminder for you to be the master of your reality as you but no one else is the creator of your own life.

Sheet1.Title: Seraphic
Sheet1.Description:
She is so bright and glorious with flora &fauna surrounded that you cannot look at her face or her garments for the splendor with which she shines. For she is terrible with the terror of the avenging lightning, and gentle with the goodness of the bright sun; and both her terror and her gentleness are incomprehensible to humans…. But she is with everyone and in everyone, and so beautiful is her secret that no person can know the sweetness with which she sustains people, and spares them in inscrutable mercy.”
The three faces in the art represents the willpower unity and freedom each women spreads to the world.

Sheet1.Title: Shackled Inception
Sheet1.Description:
“NOOOO!!!!! You are not supposed to water the plants!”
“You are on your periods!”

As obscene as it may sound, it's an unfortunate reality in our own homes. Something I happened to hear recently and could not stop myself but discuss with the person. This is not the first and the only thing I’ve came across and pretty sure that I have come nowhere close to the actual harassment that the girls in our society are subjected to.

This piece comes from a very small perspective at how girls/women/non-binary people are viewed. This is not something I can relate to one specific experience but a lot of key observations and perspectives.

Sheet1.Title: Elemental Powers
Sheet1.Description:
Our hands..some people think that hands don't have much power. They are definitely wrong. If there is the right will power and the belief that we can, then we can " Poori jagath ko hila sakthe he " and i always believe in this.

Presenting : Elemental Powers

In the artwork, the flowers and bushes represent the land/earth, then water, fire, the direction and curve of the water drops depicts wind, the smoke represents smoke/clouds & the red circle behind represents the circle of life. The water and fire are shaped as of like hands itself. These all depicts to the fact that hands can control anything.

Sheet1.Title: Yaksha, the Oracle of Fables!
Sheet1.Description: Yakshan, invokes the spirit of the ancestors and becomes a medium of divine intervention. As a dramatis personae, Yakshan assumes different roles, particularly the mythological gods, rendering the possibilities of the folk, classical and rural forms of theatre, and at the same time depicting the moral in the myth.

Sheet1.Title: Fractal Spirals
Sheet1.Description:
Fractal Spirals is algorithmic art created from fractal objects represented by a repetitive mathematical pattern resulting in this form of imagery.

Dimensions: 6000 × 3169

Sheet1.Title: Chaos
Sheet1.Description: Accept that life is uncertain, unpredictable, complicated and fast. Accept it all as it is good, bad, great and every way in-between. Life has always been in chaos so let's get used to it. Accept it and take a step.

Sheet1.Title: Mirage
Sheet1.Description:
Sometimes, beauty- tantalizing, magical, hypnotizing as the undulating motion of fish illuminated in the soft glow of an aquarium- can be a deceptive, cruel thing. 

The fishes, when viewed from beyond the illusory glass, seem as though they are frozen in a patina of perfection, but the turbulence that seethes beneath the stillness is all but invisible to our unseeing eyes. Those beautiful creatures, trapped in a mirage, call to our own souls, trapped in the vice-like grip of the lovely lies we tell ourselves at the behest of the world.

Sheet1.Title: The Companion
Sheet1.Description:
This artwork made using 600 Rubik’s Cubes portrays Lord Krishna, who was the best companion Arjuna had had during his moments of breaking down in the midst of Kurukshetra War. 
This artwork tries to emphasise the necessity of having, as well as being, that good friend everyone deserves to have.

Details:
1/1 artwork
Made with love using 600 Rubik’s Cubes
Physical size: 6 ft x 4 ft (approx.)
Weight: 70 kg (150 pounds) approx.

Sheet1.Title: ATHAZAGORAPHOBIA
Sheet1.Description:
The fear of fading into obscurity. With a feeling of madness, it's been curated.

This RARE abstract painting portrays the anxiety of being forgotten in society through pure imagination.

Open for debate and interpretation.

Sheet1.Title: Rediscover Yourself
Sheet1.Description:
An amazing thing happens when you get honest with yourself and start doing what you love, what makes you happy. Your life literally slows down. You stop merely looking forward to special events. You begin to live in each moment. You just ride the wave that is life, with this feeling of contentment and joy. You move fluidly, steadily, calm and grateful. A veil is lifted, and a whole new perspective is born.
"The world has slowed so you can rediscover yourself."

Sheet1.Title: Gaia: Moeder van het leven
Sheet1.Description:
Gaia: Moeder van het leven is an illustration of the greek goddess of life and earth, Gaia.
The piece is also a representation of the exquisiteness and strength of women and how they bring life to the world.

Sheet1.Title: Virago
Sheet1.Description:
I am willing to fight for those who can not fight for themselves.The World hurt me I'm not gonna let this happen to anyone else!!
Her scars and fire in her eyes indicate that she has a painful back story, she has been fighting since she was a child.She grew mentally and emotionally strong through each challenges of life and created herself as a warrior
an unstoppable, strong and fearless warrior!!

Sheet1.Title: TRANQUIL
Sheet1.Description:
"What you think, you become
What you feel, you attract
What you imagine, you create."
- Buddha

'Peace of Mind' is something we seek in the world, but it is something that lies within us. Our mind is one of the most powerful tool, wield it.

Sheet1.Title: Infinite love
Sheet1.Description: Love has no boundries . if you love someone and they also love you nothing can stop you . love makes you do amazing things wich you cant even imagine . and love is the only thing that can change anything . and right now is the much needed thing in the world looking at what's going on in world.

Sheet1.Title: Serene summertime
Sheet1.Description:
This is work from collection "A hundred faces". It's my declaration of love to drawing portraits.
"Serene Summertime" is about wild wind in our hairs, about first love, about a bittersweet memories, about serene time what we all spent each summer.
"She wishes this moment would never end, like the wind in her hair."

Sheet1.Title: Strip Away
Sheet1.Description:
I created this piece to visually see all our inner lies, masking personalities and stiffed words all being blown out through the mouth, like a haunting side of our soul is leaving the body. A grey cloud raining and washing away the past and removing the mask.

As a foreign student in Europe, I felt a lot of pressure to hide many aspects of my culture, clothing and thoughts. I was afraid of not being able to fit in. This all stripped away as I grew older and began adding more cultural expressions to my art. It allowed me to flourish with appreciation.

Sheet1.Title: Maya
Sheet1.Description:
Maya

A mystery woman
Has enormous secrets within
Someone who dares to be real
Who knows her capabilities.
And knows how to turn them into possibilities.
A queen with an invisible crown who never waited for a king to build her empire.
Dont go by that soft look on her face,she has fire within. 
She is me ,she is you ,she is that woman who believes in herself and believes that she can be everything that she decides to be .

Sheet1.Title: Secret Garden
Sheet1.Description:
Does a Tree talk?
Does a Bird talk?
Does a river talk?

Yes, it is! There is always Sound amongst the trees in the Garden, but our hearts must be very quiet to hear it.

Sheet1.Title: • Chitrangi Mahal •
Sheet1.Description:
• Chitrangini Mahal • 
An Indo-Islamic Gem amidst Vijaynagara Architecture
This artwork is an visual derivative of the Chitrangini Mahal aka Lotus Mahal at Hampi, Karnataka. The lotus-shaped palace is an important secular structure amidst the architecture of Hampi which is mainly of the Vijaynagara style. 
The monument is literally named after the idea of the architecture it is inspired from "Palace of Lotus". The idea was to revisit a hidden gem of architecture amidst the Vijayanagar landscape that provides a secular perspective to the overall idea of how architecture is perceived.
The artwork done using #caddforart celebrates the secular aspect of art and how it allows us to look at a complex layer of history that is often overshadowed.

Sheet1.Title: One Way
Sheet1.Description:
Life is a one-way journey
I can't get my current hours back 
I can't get my current heartbeats back 
I can't get my current breath back
Because life is a one-way journey

I decided to live fully today
I decided to walk fully today
I decided to give fully today
Because life is a one-way journey

I want to spread positivity today
I want to spread peace today
I want to spread the love today
Because life is a one-way journey

Sheet1.Title: Namaste
Sheet1.Description: This piece is dedicated to 'Namaste', our Indian greeting. I grew up with it, as did most of our people. I say it when I first speak with anyone. It felt like in a time of owning our brown-ness, our culture, our heritage, an ode to our greeting depicted by modern Indians of various creeds and lifestyle choices had to be created. That's what this piece represents. Us, the modern India, the NFT India, connected to and confident in our being and all that that means.

Sheet1.Title: BEYOND
Sheet1.Description:
She was a butterfly bringing change, hope and life,
Finding colours to nirvana trying to get high,
Powerful yet stable, 
She brought peace to every eye,
Watching her move as she fly,

One dark night she saw a light,
Burning high and low at times,
Moving free in the sky,
She saw love in that light,
Her heart felt warmth and spark in eyes,
She called her firefly,

One knew love and other knew life,
Both filled with desires looked in eyes,

Flames in hearts they took each other to worlds apart,
One ruled the day and other lived the dark,
With growing feelings they knew the truth too,
No matter how beautiful it could be,
They had to be where they were meant to be,
Wishing for a life where they could grew,

With all the power they had,
They reached a bridge never seen,
Connecting both worlds in between,
Yet somewhere Beyond they could think,

Where stars brought the light and universe gave them life,
They found love beyond boundaries,
A connection without lies.

Sheet1.Title: Innocent Company
Sheet1.Description:
Portraying a man with his innocent best friend, gazing at the grandeur of the machine that approaches them. With an orange sunset and the titanic planets as a backdrop. 
Even with this overwhelming sight, the puppy stays put. Focusing on what’s in front but never forgetting who is beside him.

Sheet1.Title: She's a nomad
Sheet1.Description:
I ve always wanted art to be that widens eyes, with not words but the heart of the person should call it beautiful. 
I started with the idea of drawing a nomad and somewhat that connects nature. So a women I started to draw with and along the line an amazing traditional clothing with contrast colors. 
A women cannot not be common, there's always something special, n so I chose a traditional dress with jewels to meet the idea of special. I had a simple thought process- something beautiful and green and that's women and nature. 

I totally drew this on my phone, almost took me a week to complete.

Sheet1.Title: The Shaman
Sheet1.Description: It is beautiful to love as women. Each individually enchanting in their own way, conjuring a legacy of lovemaking in their wake. Generations of memories are passed down to us in the form of stories. Much of what is told no longer relevant as we are different individuals living in different times. Still, there is splendor in how each woman yearned, tried, succeeded or failed yet did not give up on love.Leaving behind the tale of how she bewitched her beloved.

Sheet1.Title: Escaping the Bedlam
Sheet1.Description:
Within the chaotic world, it has become hard for people to live, to even breathe here. All the pessimistic aspects of this world are leading this planet towards a declination in humanity and peace.

Nature is a way out of this chaos. The power of nature is immeasurably immense. One can heal and prosper in the lap of nature. It holds the secret of this world.

This illustration is a representation of how a person is evading the situation of mayhem and is being helped by the lovely nature.

This is also a reminder for all of us, to escape from certain situations which are making us feel suffocated. Be happy, always :)

Sheet1.Title: Self Love
Sheet1.Description:
Embrace the flowers of self love.

The Earth cries out of humanity,
to respect in rhythmicity.
To contemplate self you and you will see that;

Even on a beautiful sunny day, 
not all flowers bloom together.
To be able to yield to storm
and yet to grow robust like flowers bloom.

Burn! There are leaf shadows everywhere-
To live a little longer myself drowning in waves.
To plant a garden of my soul decorated in flowers.

Sheet1.Title: Divine Waters
Sheet1.Description:
She can drown you, she can cleanse you, she can save you. She is water. 
Feminine energy is like water, powerful, deep, and pure. Her movement, her power, and her color draw us closer to her. 
She is the epitome of calm and comfort when she loves, but can turn into raging waves when she is controlled. 
Let her sacredness be celebrated, let her divinity be admired, and let her purity be a source of healing.

This piece is a celebration of feminine energy, beauty, and power.

Sheet1.Title: The heroes of lockdown
Sheet1.Description: COVID lockdown which was hurriedly imposed on people had left many common people without a source of income and without food & shelter. But we've also seen how 'heroes' emerged from streets to help, feed & support each other including street animals.

Sheet1.Title: Mythos vs Logos
Sheet1.Description:
“Within infinite myths lies the eternal truth
Who sees it all? 
Varuna has but a thousand eyes, 
Indra has a hundred, 
You and I, only two.” - Devdutt Pattnaik

Sheet1.Title: Bent but not Broken
Sheet1.Description:
I'm bent
but jot broken,
I'm scarred
but not disfigured,
I'm sad
but not hopeless,
I'm afraid
but now powerless,
I'm bewildered
but not giving up

Sheet1.Title: Another Earth
Sheet1.Description:
Another Earth is my fantasy filled imagination of how Earth would be if we ALL decide to live in harmony. The true outcome of WAGMI.

In this village on my Earth, inclusivity is the corner stone of society. 

One case see women doing most traditionally male jobs. Why should boys have all the fun ?

You can see same sex partners existing without persecution.

But does inclusivity stop there ? Nope. In my “Another Earth” you can see human and non-human entities living, working, loving and evolving together.

You can see the a human child adopted by two non human entities.

Now not only do they live in harmony amongst themselves, but also with the Earth. That is why she gives back to them. 

Ploughing at night. Why not. ?
Rainbows in the moonlight. Why not. ?
Multi coloured grass and shrub. WHY…NOT ?

Let us find our “new” Earth and when we do let’s not bring in all the pettiness of this earth to our “Another Earth”. 

That may be our final chance..

Sheet1.Title: The Devotional Dance
Sheet1.Description:
This artwork is inspired by Pichwai art and Udaipuri architecture. Pichwai art is known to express one's devotion for Lord Sri Krishna and in this painting, I have tried to express harmony and devotion using balance and symmetry. 
I have always loved working with patterns and in this painting, you can see an amalgamation of patterns and colours coming together cohesively. 
May you enjoy this devotional dance.

Sheet1.Title: Tangled thoughts
Sheet1.Description: Fluid art is a form of abstract art that uses acrylic paints with a runny (fluid)consistency. The acrylic paints react with each other when combined together to make interesting and visually organic motifs. This type of art is fun for all ages.

Sheet1.Title: Purple Pages
Sheet1.Description: Purple pages artwork represents the surreal world we escape into when we turn the pages of a book. The colour purple paints a very otherworldly emotion in different shades and this art aims to transport you to that happy place.

Sheet1.Title: Chathurang - The Resilience of Draupadi
Sheet1.Description:
There is a saying " A determined Woman is unstoppable". Chathurang, an ancient game of gamble is related to the greatest war in Indian Mythology when Queen Draupadi's honour and purity was to put to test and her resilience raged a war destroying an evil dynasty.
This illustration was created with a blend of fractal patterns on handmade sketch and represents how a helpless woman protected her virtues with pure determination in a dreadful circumstance.

Sheet1.Title: Captain of my ship
Sheet1.Description: Inspired from the beautiful quote by Michael Josephson, 'You are the captain of your ship; don't let anyone else take the wheel'. A woman with the stag horns as it is symbol of power, strength, beauty, courage and oar in her hands is self portrait and also a dedication to all the unshakeable women.

Sheet1.Title: Sparkle
Sheet1.Description:
Sparkle is a hand-drawn, 2d mandala art. I loved creating the patterns and especially the dots-and-lines. 
The name Sparkle comes from the thought that fluttering butterflies appear to me as sparkling; oozing their beauty, colours and magic everywhere they fly. I've loved butterflies ever since I was a child and creating this artwork takes me back to my childhood memories. So, it’s a childhood dream in my style of mandala art.

Sheet1.Title: In Another Life
Sheet1.Description:
In another life, my burdens are replaced by my wings.
In another life, I'm free because I'm meant to be, 
Swimming, 
Far from, and high above the sea. 

Light is the way, soft is my landing, 
I'm free to move, there's nothing that can stop me. 
Not weight, not shape, not size, nor colour.
I'd float like the other,
Birds of a feather. 
And yet we'd be different, not ashamed to grow together.

In another life, I'm another creature. 
Swimming among the clouds,
And flying with the fish. 
How I wish,
I were in yet another life, unburned by this one's strife. 
Unleashed, uninhibited, undone by the ways that I have been set in.
A new dawn is on the horizon, and the clouds that I swim between are carrying me forward. 
Into a newer way, where the sunset is the start of everyday. 
And when morning comes, we lay to rest. 
Undoing what those before us
thought to be best.

-@marilyndcruz

Sheet1.Title: Rebirth
Sheet1.Description: When all seems like an end with so much hurt, loss, pain and sorrow, never forget there is always hope and an innate ability to use the resources within us to rebirth.

Sheet1.Title: I am a Woman Too
Sheet1.Description:
In our society as a consequence of various social differentiation like racism, sexism, classism, etc. a symbolic degradation was created for some specific communities that are lower in stratification. This degradation again contributes to the identity formation of those specific communities. Relating this to the transgender community the stigma and prejudice created by the majority of the society altogether leads to symbolic degradation as well as the formation of identity. In a world where things are most of the time viewed in binary transgender women still search for their identity from a third perspective. They may not be born women, but they are women just like any others. Beautiful, strong, and feminine in every way possible. 

PS: The submitted artwork is AR-enabled. To view the AR version, the artist recommends viewing it using the Artivive app.

Sheet1.Title: Dreamy Whale
Sheet1.Description: Whales live enigmatic lives, in that realm impenetrable to our gaze. Small wonder they’ve seemed magical and strange

Sheet1.Title: C U R I O S I T Y
Sheet1.Description:
The important thing in life is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existence. One cannot help but be in awe when he contemplates the mysteries of eternity, of life, of the marvelous structure of reality and surreal dreams. It is enough if one tries merely to comprehend a little of this mystery each day.

Rightbrainyart | 2022 | 3000x4000px

Sheet1.Title: Arike
Sheet1.Description: Arike is a female name from Yorubaland which mean "Cherished one". Arike is always cared for or pampered on sight. This beautiful name is expressed with a unique style which is "araism"

Sheet1.Title: DubDub Maharani
Sheet1.Description: ‘DubDub Maharani’ is dedicated to every girl who is the main character of her story. Everything she wants, she strives for it unapologetically. As opinions & expectations are never-ending, she believes it’s for the best to pay no heed! This piece portrays her fierce, assertive and badass self in the most colourful way.

Sheet1.Title: Dystopia
Sheet1.Description:
What remains of the centuries old city of Kochi is now a dystopian sunset paradise.
The after effects of pollution caused by the wars of the previous generations have rendered the air harmful for humans. Plants grow inside greenariums, nowhere else and animals are nothing but memorial sculptures by the road.
Humans have however shielded themselves inside robots to avoid direct exposure to the harmful atmospheric light & air. As time passed by, the robots became more than just mechanical units, rather people began to consider them as expressions of genderless fashion. Slowly due to lack of other interesting avenues of expression, the society began to deeply focus on excessive display of fashion on robots to the extent where it became a normal to do so. Thus a high fashion society was born in 2200 AD.
Sparkles is an Audio Visual NFT, which tries to capture surrealism in a digital media, to mesmerize the viewer.

Sheet1.Title: Wasted Life
Sheet1.Description:
A normal person spends an average of 3 hours a day on social media
That's a huge part of our life wasted which could've been used for something else
That could be learning a new skill, traveling, or even spending time with our family
Social media is great, But it needs a limit,
By living a life scrolling through our phones all the time we are wasting our own creativity and potential
Instead of overconsuming, we should try to spend that time on something that we like, 
Every time when we use social media we are traveling through a loop that makes us want to use it again
The piece Wasted life tells us how overconsumption can affect anyone. The astronaut in the piece can represent every single one of us if we are overconsuming social media
So next time when you're overconsuming just remember that you're wasting a part of your life that could've been an even better memory.

Sheet1.Title: Analog Future
Sheet1.Description: Since there exists a strong culture for analog supercars in the automotive community, this artwork is a digital reincarnation of a 90s supercar that essentially describes the endless possibilities in the metaverse.

Sheet1.Title: Floating Away
Sheet1.Description:
This is a silhouette 3D animation of a Boat sailing in the ocean and watching it inside a cave with an aesthetic evening vibe to it.

I was thinking about what to create for my submission for #namasteyNFTBLR and on the 23rd night at 1 am I got a call from my friends were at the front gate of my home and we just took the car and went in search of the nearest Beach and that was the only plan that we had in our mind. We reached the nearest beach which was like 120 km away and we reached there a bit early I mean 4 in the morning and there was no light we waited it out, The waiting was worth it and the beach we went to was a bit different the shore was a bit long and the sun came up the ocean came out. And there was a boat that was there and that got me an idea of making this piece. 

Created on Blender.

Sheet1.Title: Coherence
Sheet1.Description:
Vicious fins lurk in abundance,
The will of the prey rises at once.
Our colors merge and differences fade
An instinctual order in the depths of chaos.
Knit tight and built strong
through currents warm and cold all along.
Closely guarding one and all, 
the might of a coherent whole.


43 seconds
1920 x 1080
original soundtrack

Sheet1.Title: Eluder
Sheet1.Description: There's something about shadows because you assume what's lurking in them.

Sheet1.Title: The Praying Lotus
Sheet1.Description:
The praying lotus is made entire out of code and visual scripting. It follows the golden ratio spiral mathematical equation, and was made to understand the unification of the verses. 
An attempt to understand the algorithm of the infinite, through meditation.

Sheet1.Title: Time
Sheet1.Description:
The cogs in the watch carry on. 

As life unravels about us, we spin in an infinite cycle of regrets; of the could have beens and have beens.

But we hold together and soldier on. For the scars are nothing but sprinkles. Like confetti blasted on a watch, and the cogs always go on, as we soldier on.

Sheet1.Title: Old Chibi Totoro
Sheet1.Description:
This artwork is representation of tranquility and the serene life of the old Totoro the Bunny, enjoying the beauty of nature in its own way. The scene captures the life it has had and things it has been through, emphasizing on the fact that journey is more important than the destination. 
Anime has always been a major part of my life ever since I was a kid. When I learned the skills to make 3D art, I wanted to use it to pay tribute to the things I love in my own way. So this is the aesthetic, hyper realistic version of my art piece of the legendary myth, old chibi totoro.

Sheet1.Title: Citadel
Sheet1.Description:
Citadel:
A castle on high ground inside or outside a city where people seeks refugees while there's been an emergency or war attack on that city

The Kenneth Castle serves as a bunker during ancient times in Jasper City. Millions are dying, getting scattered during war times, several seeks refugees, shelter and are residing inside this castle. It is a giant fortress surrounded by deadly traps, wild animals and its confusing geometrical structure making it unable to surpass its perimeter.
Today we can see its remains covered in ivys, mosses which can be a perfect tourist and adventurous spot for the people who want to experience this massive fortress' atmosphere.

Sheet1.Title: The Lost Face
Sheet1.Description:
An enormous Face emerging from the very own city's heart can be a sensation and heart wrenching topic among the civilians but its a matter of fact that it could be a reason for an upcoming mass destruction and havoc in the city.
~ The Daily News

Sheet1.Title: Diamanté
Sheet1.Description: "Diamanté" is one of my favorite pieces I did , I don't wanna describe it much in words cuz imo art should describe itself to the viewer :)

Sheet1.Title: Toxic love.
Sheet1.Description: Everyone's been in love for atleast 1 time in his/her life, and it's crazy that how intimidating and amazing things love can make you do and doesn't make you realize that it can create alot of toxicity as well. The insecurities, overthinking hits you hard when the person you're in love with starts to take you for granted and looks out for validation in someone else. Toxicity effects the mental health of a person when it hits you with self doubts and you start to feel that you're not enough for the relationship where you're putting the efforts into. In a toxic relationship there's always someone very cunning who uses other person's weakness for their own benefits. Not every relationship is like that and I'm happy that some people finds the one with whom they genuinely feel happy.

Sheet1.Title: RAINBOW BIRTH🌈
Sheet1.Description: This is my Everyday#267 artwork. In here i try to bring my imagination into a digital piece by doing the scene in 3d. This is a world of rainbow where imaginary things are happen, you can find huge red mushrooms, rainbow crystals from where rainbows are born in my imaginary world. Explore the art-piece and unlock your imaginations with it.

Sheet1.Title: Themyscira Wine
Sheet1.Description: Themyscira is a mythical wine I've made to embrace the art of winemaking. Wine is one of the most civilized things in this world and one of the most natural things in this world that has been brought to the greatest perfection. Because beer was made by men, but the wine was made by Gods. Being preserved underground in Winters of Georgia (the cradle of wine) from 6000 B.C. & served to old gods to getting served at fancy pubs in 2022 A.D., wine has always been the first choice of people regardless of its type. Some people like the Red wine, some like the Sparkling & some like the Fortified. It's just a matter of taste that makes wine subjective to selection.

Sheet1.Title: Cute Catto
Sheet1.Description: Don't let your dreams become your regrets, chase them, go after them!

Sheet1.Title: UNCHARTED
Sheet1.Description: We fear what we don't understand. Only way into the light is to dedicate ourselves to acquiring knowledge on all things alien to us. This piece is an ode to open-minded learning.

Sheet1.Title: Cherry soda ramyeon
Sheet1.Description: I've always been a big fan of japanese culture and had a dream recently where I was walking down one of those peaceful streets so wanted to relive that moment and tried recreating it.

Sheet1.Title: Emstone
Sheet1.Description: The City that let us peer into the potential world of fantasy and sci-fi. With massive cityscape designs you can imagine what life could be like in another universe & share that vision with others

Sheet1.Title: The Heart of Digital Art
Sheet1.Description:
Digital space is constantly evolving. AI and machine learning is not only giving birth to a new era but it is an evolution of new species. 

Our heart beats faster and faster as we step into tomorrow.

Sheet1.Title: Harmony of the Living - By Karishma Bagla
Sheet1.Description:
It is the peace we share and the harmony we live in,
It is the love we share and the nature we stay in,
This co-existence of all the living beings; the birds, animals, flora, and humans,
It all exists due to the dance & music of all living and non-living creations by the wonders of nature, and, we must oath to protect it as our mother, who spreads her loving wings to embrace us with care, and protection, and nurtures every single being in this ecosystem of life
For we owe so much to her, we rectify our actions by the Art of Giving, And as soon as the ‘rights to the wrongs’ in our hearts & actions start reflecting, We find serenity again, in this land of the living. Let us not forget that after all, we are one!
This artwork is made with love using both digital painting & artificial intelligence. If desired, the collector can contact me to get the full resolution image and written permission to utilize it for commercial purposes.
Twitter- @KarishmaBagla
Instagram- @KarishmaArtwork

Sheet1.Title: Protecting nature
Sheet1.Description:
The fairy soldiers are brave and agile, their magic attacks can be very dangerous and they use to wear goggles to protect their delicate eyes from the sun. This specimen was seen taking a very short rest in a safe area but she was alert as you can see in her pose. Let’s wish her luck protecting her enchanted realm from harm and evil. Light and magic will prevail while we believe in fairies, let’s help them protect nature, magic and wonder! 

AI artwork made with NightCafe and mildly enhanced with Photoshop.

Sheet1.Title: Flowers & The Flow
Sheet1.Description:
Flowers & The Flow is a piece of fractal art style, It's an algorithmic art piece which is generated using mathematics.
The fractal art style was introduced in the1980s.
"Flower" interprets life's peace, harmony, life and death and "The Flow" represents the never-ending time and the repetition of the flower and its reincarnation.

Sheet1.Title: The Deluded Priest
Sheet1.Description: A priest is one of the most accountable souls on the earth but what and when if he is captured by his own delusions, what if he wants to consider himself God as well, and when the illusion breaks, all he knows that he is a mere mortal. A story that wants to tell itself but cannot and in the same moment is known by everyone.

Sheet1.Title: NFT-Sailor
Sheet1.Description:
Waves come & go but artist/collector sails through tides relentlessly as Sun & Stars shine through & bless world of NFTs. 

This artwork is a tribute to NFT community.
Created using java processing algorithms & 3D base images were created using Blender 3D.

Technical specifications:
Style - Creative coding
File Type - MP4
File Size - 1.18 MB
Total frames - 321
FPS - 20

Sheet1.Title: Agust D
Sheet1.Description:
Min Yoon-gi (Korean: 민윤기) known professionally by his stage names Suga and Agust D, is a South Korean rapper, songwriter and record producer. Managed by Big Hit Music, he debuted as a member of the South Korean boy band BTS in 2013

He adopted the alias Agust D in 2016 for his mixtape. It was from his initials DT. In short for his birthplace, Daegu Town, and "Suga" spelled backwards.

Sheet1.Title: Grief
Sheet1.Description:
It’s all the love you want to give but cannot. All of that unspent love gathers up in the corners of your eyes, the lump in your throat, and in that hollow part of your chest. Grief is just love with no place to go. 
World around was full of colors while I had darkness inside of me.

Sheet1.Title: El TIEMPO
Sheet1.Description:
"El Tiempo" is a memory sketch, from my days at architectural school.
This sketch captures a regular day in front of 'EL Tiempo'
The original sketch is hand-drawn on a canson paper and composed and edited in photoshop.

Sheet1.Title: Nautilus: The Living Fossil
Sheet1.Description:
Learn from Nautilus, the Beauty who survived all hardships and the Rebel who chose to remain unchanged . 

She teaches if you can't change color like rest of ur family members it's alright. 
She knows if you can develop a hard shell, unlike being soft as your siblings and if you can develop the ability to live deep in ocean You own the centuries. 

Stay unique and dare to choose different paths like her. 

Artist : @merishajohnson

Sheet1.Title: Nature is a art
Sheet1.Description:
"Humans are the greatest enemy of nature"
. 
The things that kept us alive is now dying because of us , how cruel of us can't even save our life source . We lived in their planet to make it ours and look we succeeded but the cost is too big to pay.
. 
" Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap , but the seeds that you plant "

Sheet1.Title: Elysian
Sheet1.Description:
Where will i find peace
That puts my mind at ease
Where will i find the solace i seek
Would that help me 
scale happiness at peak,
My feelings seem so worthless
Tired of wandering & searching
A broken heart i was nursing,
Ultimately i sought shelter in solitude
Numb with pain at the worlds attitude,
Stop i Did often just to question
What actually was my intention?

Sheet1.Title: My kind of place
Sheet1.Description: my kind of place !!! far away from this polluted world, with no harms to anybody no wars are happening here everyone living peacefully with nature's and animals.

Sheet1.Title: Superficial
Sheet1.Description: We are so obsessed with colors and outside appearances, that we have forgotten to appreciate individuals for who they are on the inside. For the scar that lies under the surface. For the shattered pieces of their splintered hearts, for who they truly are.

Sheet1.Title: DREAMSCAPE
Sheet1.Description: Dreamscape is an imaginative Surreal Art of things that can only happen in the dreamverse creating a dreamlike, fun visual.

Sheet1.Title: Surreality
Sheet1.Description: A digital matte art made in Adobe Photoshop by combining my own clicked photographs to reach this surreal final result, showcasing Taj Mahal in all its glory! The Taj Mahal is one of the seven wonders of the world and the most famous one, without a doubt. This artwork depicts the majestic Taj Mahal with a pinch of imagination and creativity to make it even more surreal than it actually is!

Sheet1.Title: ASTRO
Sheet1.Description: Once upon a time a astronaut gets some supernatural fantasy powers living in the sci fi planet far away from earth where living years are more .

Sheet1.Title: Light up the sky
Sheet1.Description: Light up the sky is the celebration of Independence. Mother nature and humans came together to celebrate it. July 4th fire works at Pittsburgh is a spectacular scene. Thousands come together to witness it, that day mother nature decided kickoff the show first followed by the humans. 5 shots merged into one to make this shot.
